soft.label: Soft Delete (Recommended)
soft.description: Users will be hidden from the system but all data is preserved. Can be restored later.

transfer.label: Transfer Ownership
transfer.description: Transfer all content to "Archived User" system account, then delete the user. Historical data is preserved.
transfer.bulkDescription: Transfer all content to "Archived User" system account, then delete the users. Historical data is preserved.

hard.label: Hard Delete (Permanent)
hard.description: WARNING: Permanently delete user AND all their content. This cannot be undone!
hard.bulkDescription: WARNING: Permanently delete users AND all their content. This cannot be undone!

school.label: School (Head Teacher)
school.description: Head teacher role with school management permissions

partner.label: Partner
partner.description: Admin-like access but cannot assign roles or download school data

admin.label: Admin
admin.description: Full platform access including role assignment and data downloads

dataImport.title: Import Data from WordPress

important.title: Important:
important.description: Prepare three separate files (CSV or Excel format):
important.schools: Schools - Contains school information (name, country, type, etc.)
important.users: Users - Contains teacher/user information (email, name, etc.)
important.relationships: Relationships - Links users to schools with their roles
important.templateNote: Download the templates below to see the required column format.
